name: Rebel Inc.
about:
Can you stop the Insurgency? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique and deeply engaging political/military strategic simulation.

The war is ‘over’ - but we all know that doesn’t mean anything. To stabilise the country, you need to balance military and civilian priorities to win the hearts and minds of the people, whilst also stopping insurgents from seizing power!

Rebel Inc. is the brand new game from the creator of ‘Plague Inc.’ Rebel Inc. offers a deeply engaging, strategic challenge inspired by the complexities and consequences of modern counter insurgency.

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stabilise 7 richly modelled regions
● Innovative representation of counter insurgency tactics
● Fund realistic initiatives to empower the local government
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world based on extensive research
● Intelligent strategic and tactical AI
● Sophisticated narrative algorithms shaped by your decisions
● 8 unique governors with radically different abilities
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system
● Full Save/Load functionality
● Internet connectivity not required

An important note:
Although a fictional game, Rebel Inc. looks at important real world issues and we have made every effort to deal with them sensitively. The game has been extensively researched and has been developed in cooperation with leading regional politicians, business people and journalists as well as international charities, experts and governments.

Localised in French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Traditional), and Russian.

◈◈◈

I’ve got lots of plans for updates! Get in touch and let me know what you want to see.
James (the designer)

Contact me here:
www.ndemiccreations.com/en/1-support

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

name: Dice Kingdom - Tower Defense
about:
Protect the Kingdom with your own unique strategies!
Casual Tower Defense! All about dice, summon, merge, and formation!

Special Tower Defense: Powerful Spells & Dragon's Blessing!
Gather various dice and craft your unique Tower Defense deck!

■ Tower Defense Mode: Block the Monster Invasion!
- Fight the aliens with unlimited tower defense combination!
- Always on guard! Alien invasion in diverse patterns!
- Prove your defense skills by tackling various bosses and gimmicks!
- Endless adventure and real-time battles! Clear all stages!

■ Unlimited Combination: Dice Towers & Battle Spells!
- Collect, upgrade, and research! Build your Tower Defense army of Dice!
- Rule the Defense field with dynamic battle spells!
- Clear all waves and prove your skills!
- Loot abundant rewards even while you're away!

■ Various Minigames: What's Your Record?
- From dodge game to sniping! It's simple but addictive!
- Gather resources through minigames and level up your deck!
- Continuous new Tower Defense content and minigame updates!

Casual Tower Defense for Friends, Family, and Everyone!
Dive into Dice Kingdom - Tower Defense NOW!

■ Android 6.0 or above recommended.

■ Customer Center Reception: support@111percent.mail.helpshift.com

■ Operating Policy
- Terms of Service: https://policy.111percent.net/10034/prod/terms-of-service/en/index.html
- Privacy Policy: https://policy.111percent.net/10034/prod/privacy-policy/en/index.html

name: Top Troops: Adventure RPG
about:
Top Troops is a fantasy RPG game with a unique mix between strategy and merge mechanics. Easy to try, hard to master.

The war is raging and King's Bay has been wiped out by the King's evil brother!

Build your army, merge your troops, rank them up, and lead them into epic battles on all kinds of game modes: Adventure, PvP Arena, the Chambers of Destiny, Ancient Battles with your Clan,... Your order, your command!

Customize your troops using units of different roles and factions to defeat the Dark Army. Each position on the field can have a big impact on whether you win or you lose, so bring all of your best units but also your brain to the battle!

Lead the craziest army ever, including Wizards, Samurais, Dragons, and even a Vampire Queen! These and other unique troops are waiting for their new Commander.

Classic features:
- QUICK, FUN & EPIC BATTLES: Deploy the right combination of units onto the battlefield and see them use their unique skills in idle battles!
- FORGE ALLIANCES IN CLANS and cooperate to defeat the Ancients!
- COMPETE against the best players in the PvP Arena and rise to the top of the Leaderboard in Diamond League
- MERGE & RANK UP your troops to knock down stronger enemies
- EXPAND & MANAGE YOUR KINGDOM. Reconquer the land that was lost to the King's evil brother
- CHOOSE YOUR STRATEGY: Combine units of different Factions and battle roles to maximize your chances of success!
- RECRUIT THE BEST OF THE BEST. There are +50 Squads, each with their own unique skill set!
- GAME MODES GALORE: Discover the Magic Island, earn rewards in the Adventure, face other players in the Arena, complete Quests, and learn the secrets of the Chambers of Destiny
- KEEP COMING BACK for new units and time-limited events

Commander, are you ready to face the challenge and lead the King's Top Troops to victory? Help the factions of King's Bay to earn back the land they lost!

Top Troops is is FREE to download and includes optional in-game purchases (including random items). Information about drop rates for random item purchases can be found in-game. If you wish to disable in-game purchases, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet's Settings.

Enjoying Top Troops? Drop us a review. :)

name: Connect Animal
about:
- 5000+ Levels
- 50+ Animals
- 100% offline, no needs internet or wifi
- Extremely lightweight, play at all times without wasting battery
- It's easy at the beginning and as you progress you will face a lot challenging levels.
- Classic gameplay, Simply addictive

HOW TO PLAY:
- Connect 2 similar images with up to 3 straight lines
- Each level will limit time, game over when time runs out
- Take advantage of power ups

name: Civilization VI - Build A City
about:
Play 60 turns of Civilization VI for FREE. Upgrade to keep playing!

Develop a civilization from an early settlement, grow your empire, conquer the world, and improve your strategic thinking and decision-making skills. That is what this fantastic strategy game is all about.

Civilization VI is an advanced empire building game for Android that simulates raising an empire from the beginning of time. Play as the leader of your empire and manage your resources to build new structures, empower your army to attack and defend, grow your territory, and make your citizens satisfied and happy.

Your choices and decisions have effects on the entire world ecosystem. You can choose whether to conquer the world through military dominations or cultural influence.

If you are into empire-building apps and looking for an advanced strategy game to improve your strategic thinking skills, you have come to the right place.

, often referred to as , , or , is finally available for mobile devices. Civilization VI is free to try on your Android device. Do whatever it takes to turn your small territory into the biggest empire all around the world, all on the go. Try the tutorial, create your very first structure, and begin to build your empire.


What makes this strategy game stand out from the competition is its high-quality graphics, along with its mesmerizing music, smooth animations, and high performance.


In this thrilling strategy game, your decisions and tactics don’t just affect your own empire; they also change the world ecosystem. You can decide to utilize your military forces to conquer the world or follow a more civilized approach. As for resource management skills, be aware that your resources are limited! You need to have a solid strategy to use your resources in a way that leads to a growing and thriving civilization.


Whether you’re a seasoned strategy gamer who used to play Sid Meier's Civilization games on your PC or you’re a beginner who has just started playing strategy and simulation games, we've got you covered.

, the engaging empire-building app, delivers everything you should expect from strategy games and sets the bar even higher by offering console-quality graphics, easy to learn gameplay with endless challenges and possibilities, a wide range of options and choices to grow your territory, and much more.



Clean and neat design with a fresh and intuitive interface
High-quality graphics with smooth animations
Exciting strategy game to build an empire and conquer the world
Empire building game suitable for amateurs and professional gamers
Create buildings and upgrade structures
Manage your resources and improve strategic thinking skills
Make wise choices and change the future of the planet
Download on your Android phone or tablet, and let us know about any bugs, questions, feature requests, or any other suggestions via support@aspyr.com
